sentences.english: Ertan hydropower station is the first power station built on Yalong River.
sentences.chinese: 二滩水电站是雅砻江梯级开发的第一个水电站。

sentences.english: Hongjia Ferry hydropower station is a tap station of wujiang River step exploitation in Guizhou province.
sentences.chinese: 洪家渡水电站是贵州省乌江梯级开发的一个龙头电站。

sentences.english: Those who climb the Western Steps experience a more rugged climb.
sentences.chinese: 而选择攀登西面梯道，则要经受崎岖不平的梯级。

sentences.english: The river basins cascade hydropower development may cause the cumulative effects on ecology and environment.
sentences.chinese: 流域的梯级开发对生态环境产生累积效应。

sentences.english: At last, the more suitable structure of intercooler to the step utilization of the energy is designed.
sentences.chinese: 找到了适合能源梯级利用的中冷器的结构形式。

sentences.english: Just because I fell down on the escalator that is so spiky.
sentences.chinese: 就是因为我在尖尖的电动扶梯梯级上跌了一下。

sentences.english: The Three-Gorges and Gezhouba cascade in china is taken as a study case.
sentences.chinese: 本文以国内的三峡葛洲坝梯级水电站作为研究对象。

sentences.english: Many tourists puffed up the steep steps of the ancient pagoda.
sentences.chinese: 许多旅游者喘着气登上古塔陡直的梯级。

sentences.english: Countries in teer tier three face possible cuts in American systems assistance.
sentences.chinese: 在第三梯级的国家可能面临美国资助的减少。

sentences.english: This thesis hopes to offer the reference for hydropower cascade development and navigation planning in the Jinsha river.
sentences.chinese: 为金沙江流域的水电梯级开发和航运规划提供参考。

sentences.english: Basic feature of the latter one and engineering conditions are briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文简单介绍了凰岗梯级的基本特点和工程情况。

sentences.english: Outside ladder rungs shall be painted with non-skid type paint.
sentences.chinese: 外部梯级应涂以防滑涂料。

sentences.english: The whole of this itinerary resembled a descent of black steps.
sentences.chinese: 他走的这整条路线好象是一条在夜间摸黑下山的梯级。

sentences.english: The large size diameter of step roller operates minimizes the noise and prolongs the product life.
sentences.chinese: 大直径的梯级滚轮，运行平稳，噪音更小，寿命加长。

sentences.english: The hydropower cascade exploitation of a river basin inevitably causes the spatiotemporal distribution of water resource to change.
sentences.chinese: 水电梯级开发必然会导致水资源的时空分布发生改变。

sentences.english: Jinping First Stage Hydropower Station is an important cascade hydropower station located on Yalong River in Sichuan Province.
sentences.chinese: 锦屏一级水电站是雅砻江干流上的重要梯级电站。

definition: vertical shaft (for mining, ventilation systems etc)
to walk slowly up a flight of steps (idiom)
drop of height in waterway/staircase of waterfalls
steps/flight of steps/step (over obstacle)/fig. way out of an embarrassing situation/bench (geology)
pedal (in a car, on a piano etc)/treadle/footstool/footrest/footboard
